      • encodeParam

        public static String encodeParam(String textParam)
        Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using a specific encoding scheme. This method uses the supplied encoding scheme to obtain the bytes for unsafe characters.
        Parameters:
        textParam - The text to URL encode.
        Returns:
        Encoded text from textParam.
        See Also:
        URLEncoder.encode(String, String)

      • isEmpty

        protected final boolean isEmpty(String textParam)
        Checks whether the textParam is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        textParam - The text to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the textParam is empty.

      • closeAndClean

        public void closeAndClean()
        If the HTTP Client is set, this will close and clean any connections that needs to be closed.

      • closeConnectionNonThreaded

        protected void closeConnectionNonThreaded()
                                   throws HttpClientException
        Close the SQL and ElasticSearch Connection, but not in a separate Thread.
        Throws:
        HttpClientException - If we are unable to close.
